title: Resignations proffered
body:
Start the countdown. Our last day of typical, stable, coporate-style, benefits-included work will be December 23rd. We'll be completely relocated to Springfield before the year is through.

This will most likely prove to be the single most stress-filled holiday season of my entire life.
author: Dan

comments.author: Luke
comments.body: I can't imagine ever having the guts to do what you guys just did (quit.)  Congratulations.  And now...to the Moxie!

comments.author: justin
comments.body: Congrats!  Wow... that's only a month and half away...

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body:
Thanks guys! We're going to need all the good luck and well-wishing we can get!

"Man, I wish I had a well in my front yard" - that kind of well wishing doesn't count.

comments.author: Oz
comments.body: This must be incredibly terrifying.  Good luck, my man!  We're all pulling for you!

comments.author: vadergrrrl
comments.body:
Im doing the same thing. My last day of my corporate america job is Dec 15. I move Dec 26.

Good luck to you.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body:
Oz: Terrifying and exhilerating all wrapped into one.

Vadergrrrl: Here's to all the people leaving their jobs in or around Christmas time! Good luck to you too!

comments.author: matt
comments.body: you rule!  if someone hasn't already presented you with a giant pair of bronzed balls to sit on your mantle, let me be the first!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Matt: I'll accept this giant pair of bronzed balls and gaze upon them with pride. Thanks.

comments.author: Lor
comments.body:
A company that doesn't give you the best costume award for Slash, really doesn't deserve you at all! Your way better than them.

Good luck on the big move.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Thanks Lor! The costume contest loss was another big reason for my resignation.

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body: Should we be sending ramen noodles?

comments.author: Scott G.
comments.body: Congrats Dan and Nicole.  You've got Moxie hehehe

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body:
Maximum repsect due. It's a massive leap into the unknown, but that's what being young and having a disturbingly taut arse is all about, right?

Best of luck guys, and one of these fine days perhaps I too will sup a cold beverage in the comfy seats of The Moxie Cinema...

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Thanks for all the support, guys!

comments.author: einahpets
comments.body: Good luck. I'm leaving corporate America too! Oh wait, I work for the city. Nevermind. Good luck! If I help you move, can I get free popcorn when I visit? And when I visit, can I run the cash register and clean the bathrooms? I'll do it all for the popcorn.
